c&ugrave;ng l\u1edbn v\u1edbi m\u1ee5c ti&ecirc;u \u0111&aacute;p \u1ee9ng t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c m\u1eabu b&aacute;nh c\u0169ng nh\u01b0 h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb phong phong ph&uacute; v\u1edbi m\u1ed9t menu \u0111a d\u1ea1ng cho c&aacute;c b\u1ea1n l\u1ef1a ch\u1ecdn \u0111\u1ec3 g\u1eedi \u0111\u1ebfn nh\u1eefng ng\u01b0\u1eddi th&acirc;n, ng\u01b0\u1eddi th\u01b0\u01a1ng c\u1ee7a m&igrave;nh m\u1ed9t c&aacute;ch tr\u1ecdn v\u1eb9n nh\u1ea5t. T\u1eeb phong c&aacute;ch tr\u1ebb trung hi\u1ec7n \u0111\u1ea1i cho \u0111\u1ebfn s\u1ef1 l\u1ecbch thi\u1ec7p, cu\u1ed1n h&uacute;t .S\u1ef1 \u0111&aacute;ng y&ecirc;u hay s\u1ef1 h&agrave;i h\u01b0\u1edbc t\u1ea5t c\u1ea3 c&aacute;c cung b\u1eadc c\u1ea3m x&uacute;c \u0111\u1ec1u \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ch&uacute;ng t&ocirc;i th\u1ec3 hi\u1ec7n trong chi\u1ebfc b&aacute;nh m&agrave; b\u1ea1n \u0111\u1eb7t. \u0110\u1ebfn v\u1edbi cuibakery.com lu&ocirc;n l&agrave;m b\u1ea1n h&agrave;i l&ograve;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:24px;\"><b>Phong c&aacute;ch b&aacute;nh &Acirc;u<\/b><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>M\u1ed7i chi\u1ebfc b&aacute;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m ra v\u1edbi phong c&aacute;ch mang \u0111\u1eadm h\u01b0\u01a1ng v\u1ecb \u0111\u1ebfn t\u1eeb Ph&aacute;p v&agrave; M\u1ef9 &ndash; hai \u0111\u1ea5t n\u01b0\u1edbc n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng ti&ecirc;n phong trong vi\u1ec7c cho ra \u0111\u1eddi nh\u1eefng chi\u1ebfc b&aacute;nh ngon v&agrave; \u0111\u1eb9p m\u1eaft b\u1eadc nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi. M\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu nh\u01b0:<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><span style=\"font-size:24px;\"><b>Phong c&aacute;ch b&aacute;nh Vi\u1ec7t<\/b><\/span><\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>B&aacute;nh \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c l&agrave;m ra v\u1edbi phong c&aacute;ch nh\u1eb9 nh&agrave;ng \u0111\u01a1n gi\u1ea3n kh&ocirc;ng qu&aacute; c\u1ea7u k&igrave; nh\u01b0ng kh&ocirc;ng k&eacute;m ph\u1ea7m t&igrave;nh t\u1ebf. Mang l\u1ea1i cho ta s\u1ef1 cu\u1ed1n h&uacute;t ngay c&aacute;i nh&igrave;n \u0111\u1ea7u ti&ecirc;n. Lu&ocirc;n \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c \u01b0a chu\u1ed9ng l&agrave; m\u1ed9t s\u1ed1 m\u1eabu nh\u01b0:<\/p>","noidung_cn":null,"noidung_jp":null,"duongdantin":"datafiles","step":"1","id_step":"32","ngaydang":"1585587198","seo_title_vi":"Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u","seo_title_en":"","seo_title_cn":"","seo_title_jp":null,"seo_description_vi":"Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u","seo_description_en":"","seo_description_cn":"","seo_description_jp":null,"seo_keywords_vi":"Gi\u1edbi thi\u1ec7u","seo_keywords_en":"","seo_keywords_cn":"","seo_keywords_jp":null,"opt":"0","mt_1_jp":null,"catasort":"1","showhi":"1","num_1":"0","num_2":"0","nhom_sp":"0","p_khuyenmai":"0","p_banchay":"0","p_noibat":"0","p_spmoi":"0","p_hethang":"0","id_parent_muti":""}]
